name: Full Stack Developer: React with Spring
description: This course is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to become a proficient Full Stack developer using React for the front end and Spring for the back end. You will learn to build modern, scalable web applications that combine the power of these two popular technologies.
CourseDuration: Mon - Friday: 4 hrs a day for 10 days

name: UI development with React
description: Learn React and Redux for Front end development

name: Full Stack Developer: Angular with Spring
description: This course is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to become a proficient Full Stack developer using Angular for the front end and Spring for the back end. You will learn to build modern, scalable web applications that combine the power of these two popular technologies.
CourseDuration: Mon - Friday: 4 hrs a day for 10 days

name: Business Processes in SAP S4/HANA Asset Management
description: Learn how to describe the essential business processes in SAP S4/HANA Asset Management and the integration with other functional areas
CourseDuration: Mon - Friday: 8 hrs a day for 4 weeks

name: SAP Financials
description: Build the knowledge you need for financial management with SAP Financial Accounting and Management Accounting training.
CourseDuration: Mon - Friday: 8 hrs a day for 4 weeks
